payload.title: Review and Refactor: Validator Module
payload.description:
# Review and Refactor: Validator Module

## Context

The `validator_module` blueprint and its corresponding test files (`*_validator.test.ts`) need a comprehensive review and refactoring to ensure coherence between documentation and implementation.

## Problem

Currently identified issues:
- EARS numbering inconsistencies between `validator_module.md` and test files
- `execution_validator.test.ts` has incorrect EARS tags (1-8, 26) that don't match the blueprint
- Missing tests for EARS 9-16 (schema cache advanced and validation functions)
- Need to verify all validator test files follow the same EARS structure (1-16)

## Objectives

1. **Update `execution_validator.test.ts`**: Renumber and implement EARS 1-16 from `validator_module.md`
2. **Verify other validators**: Check `actor_validator.test.ts`, `task_validator.test.ts`, etc. for EARS coherence
3. **Remove schema-specific EARS**: EARS 17-29 were removed from `validator_module.md` as they belong to schema validation
4. **Ensure consistency**: All `*_validator.test.ts` files should implement the same generic EARS 1-16

## Success Criteria

- [ ] `execution_validator.test.ts` implements all EARS 1-16
- [ ] All validator test files have coherent EARS structure
- [ ] No schema-specific EARS in validator tests (those go to `schema_integration.test.ts`)
- [ ] `validator_module.md` is the single source of truth for validator EARS

## Files Involved

- `packages/blueprints/03_products/core/specs/validator_module.md`
- `packages/core/src/validation/*_validator.test.ts` (all validators)
- `packages/core/src/validation/*_validator.ts` (reference implementations)
